actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to make corrections in the enrollment of the bill H.R.4174.

summary.text: Changes the enrollment of H.R. 4174 (Small Business Administration Reauthorization and Amendment Act of 1988) with respect to amendments of the Small Business Computer Security and Education Act of 1984 in connection with public-private cooperation in providing management assistance to small businesses.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to make corrections in the enrollment of the bill H.R.4174.
